bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High-Voltage Expulsion, Current-Limiting and Combination Type Distribution and Power Class External Fuses, With Rated Voltages From 1 kV Through 38 kV, Used for the Protection of Shunt Capacitors

IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for High-Voltage Expulsion, Current-Limiting and Combination Type Distribution and Power Class External Fuses, With Rated Voltages From 1 kV Through 38 kV, Used for the Protection of Shunt Capacitors
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.43/D11, Apr 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes specifications for high voltage (above 1000 volts) distribution and power class expulsion, current-limiting and combination type external capacitor fuses and accessories, with rated voltages from 1 kV through 38 kV, for protecting shunt capacitors complying with IEEE 18 and NEMA CP 1. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating current systems. These fuses may be used with capacitor units, groups of units, or entire capacitor banks.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
